#Paris Map
```{r P1}
library(leaflet)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r P2}
EiffelTour <- c("<a href= 'https://www.toureiffel.paris/en/access-map'>Eiffel Tour</a>")
leaflet() %>%
addTiles() %>%
addMarkers(lat=48.858053, lng=2.294289, popup = EiffelTour)
```
